post:
Hello. This is my first time selling a server, so please tell me if I'm doing something wrong.

I have a [BLACK FRIDAY] INIZ yearly plan on this server:
2GB OpenVZ in the Netherlands

    2GB RAM
    2GB vSwap
    4 vCPU Cores
    100GB Disk space
    2000GB Bandwidth
    1Gbps uplink
    1x IPv4 address
    1x IPv6 address
    OpenVZ/SolusVM
    $6.98/Mo or $46.50/Yr

The renew date is 29/11/2014. I want to sell it for $15.
You have to have (or create) a account at INIZ, and then support will transfer the server from my account to your account.
I want the payment to my paypal account.

I want to sell to LET members that have been active for more then 2 months and have more then 25 posts.
